metadata.defaultSeoTitle: IQ | native DAO and treasury of the IQ Token
metadata.defaultSeoDescription: IQ is the native DAO and treasury of the IQ Token which powers IQ.wiki

dashboard.welcomeDescription: The <iqTokenLink>IQ token</iqTokenLink> is a multichain token that powers the IQ ecosystem of dapps. You can stake your tokens, bridge them across blockchains, vote on governance proposals, and more all through the IQ Dashboard.

swap.title: SWAP
swap.description: Get involved in the IQ Ecosystem and swap the IQ token easily across different exchange platforms.
swap.sidebarText1: The easiest centralized exchange to get IQ on Ethereum is Binance. IQ is also available on Upbit and Crypto.com.
swap.sidebarText2: The DEX with the most liquidity for IQ on Ethereum and Polygon is Fraxswap with IQ-FRAX pairs on both ETH and Polygon. Sushiswap has an IQ-ETH pair and Quickswap has an IQ-USDC pair.

metadata.title: Swap Page
metadata.description: Get involved in the IQ Ecosystem and swap the IQ token easily across different exchange platforms.

holders.description: View key data and insights on HiIQ token holders.

stake.title: HiIQ
stake.description: Lock IQ token over a period of time and earn IQ token rewards.

stakeIQ.title: Stake IQ
stakeIQ.stakedTotal: You have staked a total of
stakeIQ.lockEndDate: Your lock end date will be

transactionMessages.allowanceError: Kindly increase spending Cap to match Lock Amount
transactionMessages.specifyAmount: You must specify the amount of IQ to be locked
transactionMessages.invalidAmount: Total Iq to be locked cannot be zero or greater than the available IQ balance
transactionMessages.provideLockPeriod: You need to provide a lock period
transactionMessages.balanceExceeded: Value cannot be greater than the available balance

metadata.title: Stake Page
metadata.description: Stake IQ to earn IQ token rewards and NFT raffles. The more IQ staked and longer you stake for the greater the rewards you earn and the chance of winning NFTs.

lockOverview.aprTooltip: Assumes 4 HiIQ = 1 IQ (i.e 1 IQ locked for 4 years). Calculated based on the current IQ emissions rate (does not factor in future halvenings). IQ emissions halve each 4 years on Nov. 1.
lockOverview.volumeLockedTooltip: Total Volume locked is the total volume of IQ locked in the pool
lockOverview.averageLockTooltip: Average lock time is the average approximate value of the total no of years users are staking
lockOverview.estimatedYieldTooltip: Estimated USD value of yield available to IQ holders per week

lockedDetails.title: Current Stake
lockedDetails.checkpointTooltip: The checkpoint action is needed to keep track of the hiiq supply for a particular user.

unlockNotification.title: Unlock IQ
unlockNotification.message: You are about to unlock your staked IQ. Do you wish to continue?

stakingInfo.brainyStakingText: The longer you lock your Gauges, the more HiIQ you will receive. HiIQ decays slowly over your locking period, eventually reaching 1 -to- 1 with IQ.
stakingInfo.regularStakingText: The longer you lock your IQ, the more HiIQ you will receive. HiIQ decays slowly over your locking period, eventually reaching 1 -to- 1 with IQ.

rewardCalculator.title: Reward Calculator
rewardCalculator.yearsToLock: No of years to lock the IQ (4 years max)

networkError.title: Switch Network
networkError.message: Your wallet is currently connected to an unsupported network. To continue with Ethereum network, Switch the network in your wallet to Ethereum.
networkError.switchWallet: Switch wallet if unable to change wallet network.

claimWarning.title: Unclaimed Rewards
claimWarning.message: You have unclaimed rewards available. Please claim rewards before unlocking to maximize your earnings.

metadata.title: Voting Page
metadata.description: Follow votes and all related information.

voting.description: Follow votes and all related information.
voting.emptyState: There are no active votings at the moment, Votes in progress will appear here as they happen.
voting.sidebarText: The IQ token is fully governed by IQ's community of IQ stakers. Stakers can vote on all governance proposals and create their own proposals.

metadata.description: The numbers behind the IQ ecosystem.
